title: How to Reactivate a Pinterest Account

steps.title: Go to the Pinterest login page.
steps.content: Go to the Pinterest login page. Visit www.pinterest.com/login in your computer browser.

steps.title: Login to your deactivated account.
steps.content: Login to your deactivated account. Type your original email and password and click on the "Log in" button. Now Pinterest will send you a reactivation email. If you donâ€™t remember your password, go to www.pinterest.com/password/reset/ and reset it.

steps.title: Go to your email inbox.
steps.content: Go to your email inbox. Open the reactivation email and click on the "Reactivate your account" button. If you can't find the email check your junk folders and search your inbox for "@pinterest.com" emails.

steps.title: Done.
steps.content: Done. You should have access to Pinterest again!
